title: rap/hip hop
body: I've recently been placed in a low priority queue and i'd like to think myself somewhat of a rap connoisseur, so wanted to spark up a conversation about people favorite song at the moment or influential rappers or any shows they have been to recently to help me get through these horrific queue times

replies.body: havn't heard of watsky, not too familiar of edubble but what i've heard is not my taste, bino is the man bringing something different to the game, still cant believe hes an actor though haha but yeah i dont really listen to alot of light rap other than bino and macklemore

Watsky ( Fast Rapper )
E-Dubble ( Rapper )
Childish Gambino ( actor/rapper )
[B] Rodgers ( rapper )
these are just of a few artist that are kinda light rap :D but i listen to heavy metal now, so yeah
